document_card_ace_cups.name: Ace of Cups
document_card_ace_cups_1.desc: Inside the barn on some hay bales.
document_card_ace_cups_2.desc: On a barrel behind the run-down shed.
document_card_ace_cups_3.desc: On the nightstand in the bedroom on the right.
document_card_ace_cups_4.desc: On the barrel on the tower platform.
document_card_ace_cups_5.desc: On top of the cinema building on a square vent.
document_card_ace_cups_6.desc: On the railing on the east side at the front of the boat.
document_card_two_cups.name: Two of Cups
document_card_two_cups_1.desc: On a barrel under the building.
document_card_two_cups_2.desc: On a crate on the lower deck of the railway bridge.
document_card_two_cups_5.desc: On top of the windmill, overlooking the town. Climb the ladder.
document_card_two_cups_6.desc: On a barrel at the end of the docks.
document_card_three_cups.name: Three of Cups
document_card_three_cups_1.desc: On the back of a wagon.
document_card_three_cups_2.desc: On the barrel near the scarecrow.
document_card_three_cups_4.desc: On top of bench on front porch.
document_card_three_cups_5.desc: On a crate on the east side of the building.
document_card_three_cups_6.desc: Outside the cabin on a table with a moonshine keg on it.
document_card_four_cups.name: Four of Cups
document_card_four_cups_1.desc: On top of fireplace inside building.
document_card_four_cups_2.desc: Western side of the white barn. On a bench next to wall.
document_card_four_cups_3.desc: On window seal by the outhouse.
document_card_four_cups_4.desc: On a box near a fountain with a light.
document_card_four_cups_5.desc: On the balcony at the back of the sheriff's office.
document_card_four_cups_6.desc: On the roof of the bank at the front side. Climb the ladder at the back of the bank to reach.
document_card_five_cups.name: Five of Cups
document_card_five_cups_1.desc: On a table next to a scale.
document_card_five_cups_2.desc: Inside a shack. East side on a stack of boxes.
document_card_five_cups_3.desc: On top of the theatre facing Blackwater Restaurant and Althewate Inn.
document_card_five_cups_4.desc: On a crate halfway through the mine.
document_card_five_cups_5.desc: On the bench on the southeast side of the building at the head of the "T".
document_card_five_cups_6.desc: On the table immediately on the left of the door inside the building.
document_card_six_cups.name: Six of Cups
document_card_six_cups_2.desc: On the back of the wagon.
document_card_six_cups_4.desc: On a table right side of the yellow and green house.
document_card_six_cups_5.desc: On a crate next to the corner of the house.
document_card_six_cups_6.desc: On top of the tower on the railing. Climb both ladders.
document_card_seven_cups.name: Seven of Cups
document_card_seven_cups_1.desc: On a barrel outside of the shed.
document_card_seven_cups_2.desc: Inside the bedroom on the nightstand behind the door.
document_card_seven_cups_3.desc: Inside the house in a open cupboard.
document_card_seven_cups_4.desc: Inside the house on the fireplace.
document_card_seven_cups_5.desc: On the railing of the front porch.
document_card_seven_cups_6.desc: On an empty spool at the back of the barn.
document_card_eight_cups.name: Eight of Cups
document_card_eight_cups_1.desc: On a barrel underneath an awning.
document_card_eight_cups_2.desc: On the rightmost shelf at the shooting range.
document_card_eight_cups_4.desc: Front side of the house on a table.
document_card_eight_cups_5.desc: On a barrel underneath the covered section in the back.
document_card_eight_cups_6.desc: Inside the lighthouse on the bottom floor (after climbing the ladder, but before the stairs).
document_card_nine_cups.name: Nine of Cups
document_card_nine_cups_3.desc: On shelf on right side of entrance.
document_card_nine_cups_4.desc: On some boxes behind the outhouse.
document_card_nine_cups_5.desc: On the bench next to the old train station.
document_card_nine_cups_6.desc: Inside the house on the green cabinet in the corner.
document_card_ten_cups.name: Ten of Cups
document_card_ten_cups_1.desc: On the table beside bucket of water.
document_card_ten_cups_3.desc: Inside the barn on the back righthand side.
document_card_ten_cups_4.desc: Railway platform, on a southside wooden bench.
document_card_ten_cups_5.desc: On the back of the cart.
document_card_ten_cups_6.desc: On the table, upstairs on the second floor balcony.
document_card_knight_cups.name: Knight of Cups
document_card_knight_cups_2.desc: On a table, underneath the awning in the back.
document_card_knight_cups_3.desc: On a crate, under the awning of the barn.
document_card_knight_cups_4.desc: On a box with a sheet hanging next to it.
document_card_knight_cups_6.desc: On top of a crate on the second floor of the western bedroom in the back.
document_card_page_cups.name: Page of Cups
document_card_page_cups_1.desc: On the windowsill in the north western room.
document_card_page_cups_3.desc: On the table near the water tubs.
document_card_page_cups_4.desc: On the fireplace inside the house.
document_card_page_cups_5.desc: On a bed in the back of the house.
document_card_two_swords_3.desc: On some crates next to a wagon.
document_card_ace_pentacles_2.desc: On a table next to a scale.
document_card_six_pentacles_2.desc: On the back of a wagon.
document_card_six_pentacles_5.desc: On the back of the wagon.
arrowhead_random_0_3.desc: In the centre of the half-circle of rocks. Beware of cougars.
arrowhead_random_11_6.desc: At the eastern-most tall tree in some reddish coloured dirt.
jewelry_random_24_5.desc: Between the two graves in the centre.
provision_jewelry_qn_dmnd_earring_6.desc: In the centre of two fallen branches.
jewelry_random_15_1.desc: At the centre of the clearing by the intersection next to the tree with the signs.
help.pins_place_new: Creates a new pin in the centre of the currently displayed map.
help.show_customization: Toggles whether the customisation settings should be visible in the menu.
help.marker_color: Set a colour theme or a specific colour for item markers. “Auto” options switch colour in dark mode.
mp_animal_alligator_legendary_02.desc: This alligator has been spotted by residents in Lakay. It has a distinctive orange colouring which can be easy to spot among the green and brown of the bayou. It is patient and cunning, biding its time before it takes down prey. It is rarely seen outside the early hours of the morning and favours heavy fog and mist.
mp_animal_bison_legendary_01.desc: This subspecies of bison has been spotted grazing near Heartland Overflow. It can be distinguished from common black bison by the white colouring across its head and back. Large and muscular, these creatures will charge if provoked. They are most commonly spotted during the day, in rain and drizzly weather.
mp_animal_moose_legendary_01.desc: This moose has been sighted near Barrow Lagoon. With its white colouring, it blends naturally into the snowy landscape. However, its large black antlers are easier to spot. It is a solitary creature and will flee if approached. Sightings have been reported at night, with the animal preferring wet weather.
